summary.problem: Users could not find updated data on Rapeseed Oil and other vegetable oils on the platform; only Seeds and meal data were visible.
summary.solution: The Oils data is now available on the platform under the 'Vegoils' category. Users should look for Oils data within this category to access updated information. Additionally, trade flow data for Oils is also being updated and should be accessible for all countries in the same category.
